item.description:
We have another great presentation this month. Kevin Norton(Credit Card King),Foreclosure Auction Expert. Kevin's story is rich, colorful and informative. The market has taken a noticeable
turn for the worst. In this past month REO's(Bank owned properties) are on the market at bargain prices, that have not been seen for 10 or more years. Register early ,this one will fill up fast. dale
item.name: The Greater Boston Real Estate Investing Club June Meetup
